text: læa cng laluk khna thi xallxhˌ di thrng xea khx sayya kæ na bi thanghlay wa sing thi kha di hı kæ phwk cea nan mi wa ca pen khamphir k di læa khwam ru keiyw kab khx ptibati nı bayyati sasna k di phayhlang di mi rx sul khn dı mayang phwk cea sung pen phu yunyan nı sing thi mi xyu kab phwk cea læw nænxn phwk cea ca txng sraththa tx khea læa chwyhelux khea phraxngkh tras wa phwk cea yxmrab læa xea khx sayya khxng kha dang klaw nan læw chı him phwk khea klaw wa phwk kha phraxngkh yxmrab læw phraxngkh tras wa phwk cea cng pen phyan theid læa kha k xyu nı hmu phu pen phyan rwm kab phwk cea dwy
